turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How can I help?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order something from the menu of Starbucks.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I live in New York City uptown. What is the best Starbucks near me?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: In New York City?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Let me look it up! one sec.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I've found a Starbucks on Lexington.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: does that sound good to you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great. Yes, it does. I would like to Can I place an order for pick-up?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Certainly.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. I would like a venti cafe americano, a venti cafe mocha, and a venti skim cappuccino skim milk cappuccino.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How long do you Do you have any other suggestions to what other drinks I can order from Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I sure do!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Please, suggest something for me to order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I know their salted caramel latte is one of many people's favorites.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, that sounds interesting. What kind of milk should I use with that?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: If you are okay with whole milk, i'd suggest that.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, does that come with whip cream?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It sure can if you'd like.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Another question, do you know if that still has a chestnut praline latte?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: give me one moment to check for you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It looks like they do have Chestnut Praline Lattes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, and how about the Caramel Brulée?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They also have Caramel Brulée Lattes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. What size do they come in?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You can choose between Tall, grande and Venti.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, how about this? How about I'll cancel my other order, and I'll order a venti caramel brulee latte?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, one Venti Caramel Brulée Latte.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, great. How long do you think he'll take?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What milk do you like for the drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Whole milk will be fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great thank you!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and just to be sure, this will be a hot drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, that's fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: alright!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: teh current wait time for drinks is about 10 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that okay?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's fine. That's okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Let me go ahead.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and enter this.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: order for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, i got one venti Caramel Brulée Latte with whole milk, at The starbucks on lexington.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: One last question, would you like to add whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I would.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great choice!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright your order has been submitted .

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect incase of.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: it should be ready in 10 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect. Thank you so much for your help.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The receipt will be sent to you mobile device.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. How long will that take?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It should be there momentarily.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great. That sounds good to me.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great! you have a great day!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you, you too. Bye-bye.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: thank you!
